name: 💻 Planned Obsolescence
description: My two MacBooks facing each other, shot when I switched from the "vintage" 2008 to the "futuristic" 2013 model, both now considered "obsolete" by Apple. ✊ I fixed/upgraded them so they are still up and running in 2021! 👇 Tap on the screens to see their "planned lifespans" based on which Mac OS was the first/last supported. ꩜ By @my360fun • 360fun.net
